===================================================
||||||||||||||||| HOW TO INSTALL ||||||||||||||||||
===================================================
1- Run the file "Autorun.exe"
2- Click on INSTALL
3- Use any of the keys provided (keys are in the file "Serials & CracksKeys.txt")
4- Replace the file in the installation directory ["C:Program FilesEA GamesHarry Potter TMSystem" by default] from the file "HP.exe" [the file is in "Serials & CracksNO CD CRACK" folder]
5- Run the game & Enjoy. ThAnKs
===================================================
